com.toxic.core.engine.base

Class Backgound

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.toxic.core.engine.base.Backgound

  • public final class Backgound
extends Object

    Responsible for behavior of background. This object could be bounded witn IElement through the IElement.setBackGround(Backgound) method.


    Author:
    Strelock
